channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: 3 x pot holes, 30th December
item.description:
By bus stop outside 10/12 warden hill road. All three are within 15 metres of one another.

item.title: Multiple potholes located going down the bridge slope heading towards ‘the reddings’, 30th December
item.description:

item.title: Abandoned warning sign, 30th December
item.description:
Warning sign was put in place a few weeks ago to stop people walking near the bridge over lower high street (it had been damaged by a lorry). It was never collected and is now abandoned near Honeybourne gate flats, on Honeyborne walkway.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 2, White Hart Street, Wymans Brook, Cheltenham

item.title: Trench across road, 30th December
item.description:
Just before the junction there is a trench across the whole road. I reported it a year or so ago but it's got considerably worse.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 84, Parton Road, Churchdown, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Abandoned vehicles, 30th December
item.description:
Two vehicles have been positioned adjacent to the A40 Elmbridge Court roundabout and have remained in the same location for several months. Vegetation has grown around the vehicles, indicating they have not been moved for a significant period. The vehicles appear to have been deliberately placed at this location for the primary purpose of advertising. No formal consent or authorisation for advertising at this site appears to exist. This constitutes an unauthorised use of the public highway and a potential road safety concern at a busy junction. If left unaddressed, it risks setting a precedent for further unauthorised advertising on the highway.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Elmbridge Court, Churchdown, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet
